See the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available

question.question: What is the primary cause of facial paralysis in Ramsay Hunt syndrome?
question.option_a: Viral infection of the trigeminal nerve
question.option_b: Bacterial infection of the facial nerve
question.option_c: Autoimmune disorder affecting the facial nerve
question.option_d: Tumor compression of the facial nerve
